The EMO is responsible for monitoring the national contract attached to the French Navy

Volume : 50 users

title: WEBREF
resume: Definition and implementation of an SOA to centralized access to data repositories
involvements: Member of the project team

businessDetails: To support the process of Data Mining and Master Data Management (MDM)
Many data repositories (databases) exist for many domains : logistics, etc ..
They are scattered in the different entities of the Ministry
The database are of different nature, mainly Oracle and MSSQL
The ESB WebRef is now the unique interface for consulting these reference
Volume : 5000 software requests/day ; Up to 2 million lines for a data repository

title: PROPGUARD
resume: Software for monitoring the parameters driving of a warship's propulsion system
involvements: Project manager
Analyzing the customer needs and carrying out the functional analysis
UML modeling : class and sequence
Designing and realizing the entire system
Testing the product then delivering it to the client
businessDetails: The monitoring network of diesel engines produced data every 4 hours
The data are essentially temperature and pressure of the diesel engines
The raw data, in very large numbers, were sent on a paper printer
This impression was offering only a few readable snapshot at a given moment
I designed a switch for deriving data on the serial port of a computer or on the printer
The application automatically integrates data sent over the serial port in the database
The tool had to be as configurable as possible because areas to watch are sometimes very specific
The graphs allow assess in a glance the evolution of the engines t ° and pressure
It's possible to view graphs showing the operating data since the last 15 days
Alarms can warn machinery operators if values exceed the threshold limits
Some engine failures are, and have been prevented through the visual detection of a slight upward curve

images.desc: Graphics control of temperatures and pressures

businessDetails: At sea, sailors work day and night to ensure business continuity
At Toulon's hospital, researchers conduct studies about seamen sleep
This application is used by seamen groups during missions at sea
It allows them to enter information about their biological rhythm
This data collection allows researchers to conduct statistical studies
